Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored 131 runs off 84 balls
India won by 8 wickets with 90 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma was named Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi
Others: The match was a day-night 50-over match, with the first session from 14:00 to 17:30 and the second session from 18:00 to 21:30
